snippet: Sergio García shot back-to-back birdies to finish with a second straight seven-under-par 65 and seize a four-shot lead through the third round of the Thailand Golf Championship.
abstract: Sergio Garcia seizes third-round lead at Thailand Golf Championship in Chonburi, an Asian Tour event; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Sergio García shot back-to-back birdies to finish with a second straight seven-under-par 65 and seize a four-shot lead through the third round of the Thailand Golf Championship.
